title: "Spectroscopic and deep learning-based approaches to identify and quantify cerebral microhemorrhages"
excerpt: "Cerebral microhemorrhages (CMHs) are associated with cerebrovascular disease, cognitive impairment, and normal aging. One method to study CMHs is to analyze histological sections (5–40 μm) stained with Prussian blue."
